metadata.synopsis: Meygan thanks the player after they fought off some Shadow cursed creatures, and offers to lead the way to a safe place (last light inn). She's one of several harper scouts who may deliver variants on this dialogue, depending on who is alive.

0.speaker: Harper Meygan
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: One last glance over the area where the battle was just fought.NodeContext: Spoken softly during once last glance over the battlefield before leaving (Yonas = comrade killed at the start of the fight, also her lover)
